properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus, be the centre,
be my source, be my light,
Jesus.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus, be the centre,
be my hope, be my song,
Jesus.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Be the fire in my heart,
be the wind in these sails;
be the reason that I live,
Jesus, Jesus.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Jesus, be my vision,
be my path, be my guide,
Jesus.
